name: Zombie Chaos
description:
A single-player game where your objective is to survive 3 waves against numerous zombie opponents, but watch out, as you are only mere seconds away from death at any time.

The game includes a small, decorated environment, including street lights, roads, and various objects such as a shopping trolley, and more!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Left click to shoot
  • Move mouse to aim
